mapper.sql: OddsID, ScheduleID, CompanyID, FirstGoal, FirstUpodds, FirstDownodds, Goal, UpOdds, DownOdds, ModifyTime, Result, ClosePan, ZouDi, Running, Goal_Real, UpOdds_Real, DownOdds_Real, isStopLive, StartTime
mapper.select: select * from letgoal where ScheduleID = #{matchId} and CompanyId = #{cpy} limit 1

-- select * from letgoal where ScheduleID select s.ScheduleID as sid,l.OddsID as oid,s.MatchTime as time from schedule s,letgoal l where l.ScheduleID = s.ScheduleID and l.CompanyID = #{cpy} and l.ScheduleID = #{matchId}

select o.OddsID, t.name_j hostName, t.flag hostIcon, t2.name_j guestName, t2.flag guestIcon, s.matchTime matchDate, o.FirstGoal satFlat, o.FirstUpodds satWin, o.FirstDownodds satLose, s.HomeTeamID homeId, s.GuestTeamID guestId from letgoal o LEFT JOIN SCHEDULE s on o.ScheduleID = s.ScheduleID LEFT JOIN team t ON s.hometeamid = t.teamid LEFT JOIN team t2 ON s.guestteamid = t2.teamid where o.CompanyID = #{companyId} and o.ScheduleID = #{matchId}
mapper.insert: insert into letgoal (OddsID, ScheduleID, CompanyID, FirstGoal, FirstUpodds, FirstDownodds, Goal, UpOdds, DownOdds, ModifyTime, Result, ClosePan, ZouDi, Running, Goal_Real, UpOdds_Real, DownOdds_Real, isStopLive, StartTime) values (#{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scheduleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firstgoal,jdbcType=REAL}, #{firstupodds,jdbcType=REAL}, #{firstdownodds,jdbcType=REAL}, #{goal,jdbcType=REAL}, #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL}, #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{closepan,jdbcType=BIT}, #{zoudi,jdbcType=BIT}, #{running,jdbcType=BIT}, #{goalReal,jdbcType=REAL}, #{upoddsReal,jdbcType=REAL}, #{downoddsReal,jdbcType=REAL}, #{isstoplive,jdbcType=BIT}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update letgoal
ScheduleID = #{scheduleid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CompanyID = #{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FirstGoal = #{firstgoal,jdbcType=REAL},
FirstUpodds = #{firstupodds,jdbcType=REAL},
FirstDownodds = #{firstdownodds,jdbcType=REAL},
Goal = #{goal,jdbcType=REAL},
UpOdds = #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL},
DownOdds = #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL},
ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Result = #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ClosePan = #{closepan,jdbcType=BIT},
ZouDi = #{zoudi,jdbcType=BIT},
Running = #{running,jdbcType=BIT},
Goal_Real = #{goalReal,jdbcType=REAL},
UpOdds_Real = #{upoddsReal,jdbcType=REAL},
DownOdds_Real = #{downoddsReal,jdbcType=REAL},
isStopLive = #{isstoplive,jdbcType=BIT},
StartTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where OddsID = #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update letgoal set ScheduleID = #{scheduleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CompanyID = #{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FirstGoal = #{firstgoal,jdbcType=REAL}, FirstUpodds = #{firstupodds,jdbcType=REAL}, FirstDownodds = #{firstdownodds,jdbcType=REAL}, Goal = #{goal,jdbcType=REAL}, UpOdds = #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL}, DownOdds = #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL}, ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Result = #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ClosePan = #{closepan,jdbcType=BIT}, ZouDi = #{zoudi,jdbcType=BIT}, Running = #{running,jdbcType=BIT}, Goal_Real = #{goalReal,jdbcType=REAL}, UpOdds_Real = #{upoddsReal,jdbcType=REAL}, DownOdds_Real = #{downoddsReal,jdbcType=REAL}, isStopLive = #{isstoplive,jdbcType=BIT}, StartTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where OddsID = #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update letgoal set Goal = #{goal,jdbcType=REAL}, UpOdds = #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL}, DownOdds = #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL}, Goal_Real = #{goal,jdbcType=REAL}, UpOdds_Real = #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL}, DownOdds_Real = #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL}, ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where oddsid = #{oddsid} and ModifyTime < #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
